tileset = "saucer2";
area = "moric_saucer2";
areaname = "Moric\'s Battleship L1";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "MoricSaucer";
TempVars.warpMsaucer2a = false;
A_sprites = [{name:"Moric",model:"droma_moric",x:199,y:199,VOICE:"GdM_EARTH",conv:[["","INTERCOM."]]},{name:"INTERJECTION",model:"_trigger",x:29,y:25,ExecuteScript:function()
{
   _root.Interjection("Mardek","moricBattleship2","c_A_Rohoph");
}},{name:"Escape Pod Room",model:"DOOR7",x:29,y:9,lock:(DoomCounter == null?"lock":null),dest:["moric_saucer5",7,29],dir:"n"},{name:"Entry Room",model:"DOOR7",x:29,y:49,dest:["moric_saucer1",4,1],dir:"s"},{name:"TRANSPORT_TRIGGER",model:"_trigger",x:29,y:29,triggers:-1,WALKON:true,ExecuteScript:function()
{
   _root.WarpTrans(["moric_saucer3",4,46]);
}}];
var MoricCrystals = [[37,21],[42,29],[37,37],[21,37],[16,29],[21,21]];
var c = 0;
while(c < MoricCrystals.length)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Crystal",model:"object",x:MoricCrystals[c][0],y:MoricCrystals[c][1],type:"examine",conv:[["norm","[[RM]]This is a magical crystal, used to power the ship. There are six of them, forming a kind of giant magical circle, like those that wizards on your world sometimes use. This whole craft is round because it\'s built around the magic circle."],["smile","[[RM]]They\'re imitations of true planetary Elemental Crystals; basically just pure magic in physical form. Heh, it\'ll be a long time before the people on Belfan have anything nearly as powerful as this. I\'m awed by our own greatness sometimes, I really am."],["deep","[[RM]](Especially compared to the pissant savages on THIS Yalortforsaken mudball...)"],["susp","[[PC]]What?"],["deep","[[RM]]Oh... Nothing. I suppose that being on board this battleship gives me thoughts of home. Perhaps I can even use it when we\'re finished here... Hmm."],["norm","[[RM]]Anyway, we must go now and stop Moric. No time for idle banter!"]]});
   c++;
}
areaLoot = [{x:41,y:51,amount:5,item:"Antidote"},{x:5,y:26,amount:3,item:"BetterPotion"},{x:17,y:27,amount:5,item:"HolyWater"},{x:13,y:7,amount:6,item:"MotionPotion"},{x:14,y:7,amount:1,item:"PhoenixDown"},{x:38,y:24,amount:4,item:"MotionPotion"},{x:51,y:20,amount:1,item:"PhoenixDown"},{x:47,y:39,amount:1,item:"BetterPotion"},{x:40,y:44,amount:3,item:"HolyWater"},{x:36,y:34,amount:2,item:"MugwortJuice"}];
var ms = 0;
while(ms < 12)
{
   var X = 0;
   var Y = 0;
   do
   {
      X = random(map[0].length);
      Y = random(map.length);
   }
   while(!IsValidTile(X,Y));
   
   A_sprites.push({name:"Droma",model:"droma_moric",x:X,y:Y,walkspeed:10 + random(21),elem:"EARTH",conv:[["","<<ROBO>>Oy! Yeh\'re an intruder! That means I \'ave ter go inter Defence Mode an\' kill yeh!"],Do = function()
   {
      BATTLE([["Droma_Moric","SecurityOrb","SecurityOrb",null],["Droma","Security Orb","Security Orb",null],[14,14,14,null],"TRIO"],DoomCounter == null?"battle":"Flee",true);
      return true;
   }]});
   ms++;
}
map[21][29] = DoomCounter != null?21:121;
map[37][29] = DoomCounter != null?121:21;
foes = MONSTER_TABLES.MORIC_SAUCER;
btlChance = 3;
